trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The giant can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks, using Storm Sword or Thunderbolt in any combination.

action.name: Storm Sword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) Slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) Lightning damage.

action.name: Thunderbolt
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 14}, range 500 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 2d12 + 9}) Lightning damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Deafened|XPHB} conditions until the start of the giant's next turn.

action.name: Lightning Storm {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} originating from a point the giant can see within 500 feet. {@actSaveFail} 55 ({@damage 10d10}) Lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):
